#summary This Page Outlines the code design and gives details for each element.

= Code Design Details =

==Classes Overview==
There are two peices that are to be considered. The server side and the client side.
===Client Side===
  * ClientManager
  * User
  * Job
  * Version
  * RemovableMedia
===Server Side===
  * Servermanager
  * UserList
  * User
  * DataRepository
  * Version



== Class Details ==
===ClientManager===
====Members====
  * string serverSocket
  * string serverAddress
  * boolean online
  * directory tempBufferStorageDir
  * string LoginTime
====Methods====
  * string getLoginTime()
  * void setLoginTime()
  * void restoreBackup()
  * void checkAllJobs()
===User===
====Members====
  * string userID
  * list{{{<job>}}} JobsAssociated
  * string password
====Methods====
  * string getUserID()
  * void setUserID(string)
  * job getJob()
  * void addJob(job)
  * list listAllJobs()
  * string getUserPassword()
  * void setUserPassword()
  * boolean AuthnticateUser()
===Job===
====Members====
  * string creatorID
  * list{{{<string>}}} directories
  * string BackupTime
  * string jobName
  * boolean IncOrFull
  * float currentVersion
  * string startTime
====Methods====
  * string getCreatorID()
  * void setCreatorID(string)
  * string getBackupTime()
  * void setBackupTime(string)
  * string getJobName()
  * void setJobName(string)
  * boolean getIncOrFull()
  * void setIncOrFull(boolean)
  * float getCurrentVersion()
  * void setCurrentVersion(float)
  * string getStartTime()
  * void setStartTime(string)
  * void sendBackup()
  * void addFilesAndDirectories()
===Version===
====Members====
  * float version
  * string date
  * string lastBackup
====Methods====
  * float getVersion()
  * void setVersion(float)
  * string getDate()
  * void setDate(string)
  * string getLastBackup()
  * void setLastBackup()
